ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Gordon on Dirge and Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: i bet if they had this ability when dirge was implemented they would have used it then instead of mana.  i really like the idea, except for the fact that we
ygData.messageBody:
i bet if they had this ability when dirge was implemented they would have
used it then instead of mana. i really like the idea, except for the fact
that we would have to keep this song memmed all the time if we really wanted
to use it, since it will take 15 minutes to be able to sing it after it is
memmed, and i have enough trouble deciding which 8 songs to use. i would
however be much more likely to have it as a often memmed song with a 15
minute timer rather than using 800 mana.

Shada Powa, L51 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rosha Unca [mailto:captrosha@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 26, 2000 11:52 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Gordon on Dirge and Mana
>
>
> Found on the gameplay forum at
> http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/036206.html
>
> Hello all,
> Bard's currently have 2 songs that use mana, DDD being one of them,
> and it uses a *lot* of mana. We figure that there are probably a few
> bards out there who can cast 2 of these, but not many.
>
> Since nothing that regens mana will help bards, and they only get
> 1pt/tick back, it takes a LONG time for them to recover from singing
> this song.
>
> We've recently acquired the ability to place a song-specific recast
> time on the songs. We're considering replacing the mana requirement
> on the song with a 15 minute re-sing time.
>
> Thoughts?
>
> -Gordon
>
>
>
